message: but the JSON for a starred message doesn't say what topic the starred message is in
my ideal solution would be for

u'topic': {u'id': u'14247',
            u'name': u'new topic',
            u'url': u'/ptonetesting/new-topic/'},
We'd like our bot to say something in the chat room when somebody stars something
and there isn't an obvious API for finding out what the topic id of a given message is
We would also like to have the option to replace everyone's avatar in a topic with Daria. Just saying.
